Posts.Content: Hi, thanks for your reply. Its reasuring.i will have mine in a few months time, not been confirmed yet. They said it weakens the abdominal muscle. How much? Are you able to excersise when its healed?
Posts.Title: Breast reconstruction surgery

Posts.Content: Hi chick36, When did you have yours done? Are you happy with the look? How is your tummy looks? Did you have lots of swelling? Did you start exercising?  How long were you in hospital for?
Posts.Title: Breast reconstruction surgery

Posts.Content: Hi, Could you tell me your experience after reconstruction surgery. I am esspecially interested in the one they use your own tissues, no inplants.
Posts.Title: Breast reconstruction surgery

Posts.Content: Hi, I was told that having that surgery weakens your tummy muscle. Is that permanent? How weak do they get? Will i still be able to excersise? Should i strenghten the muscles there before surgery?
Posts.Title: Masectomy - any pre & post op advice
